local_intent: Detect red_plate, move above it, lower until contact, verify contact, open gripper to release, and retreat.
assumptions: red_plate within reachable workspace and localizable
gripper currently holding the white_plate prior to placement
coherence_with_global: Matches the global BT transfer phase: after detecting the red plate the subtree moves above it, lowers until contact, verifies contact, opens the gripper to place the white plate, then retreats.
